tasks.title: Core Todo Components
tasks.description: Build TodoList, TodoItem, and AddTodo React components with basic functionality. Use TypeScript for type safety and Tailwind CSS for styling foundation.
acceptanceCriteria: TodoList component renders list of todos
TodoItem component shows todo with toggle and delete
AddTodo component has input field and submit

tasks.title: State Management & Persistence
tasks.description: Create useTodos custom hook with state management and LocalStorage persistence. Handle add, toggle, delete operations and sync with localStorage.
acceptanceCriteria: State loads from localStorage on mount

tasks.title: Styling & Polish
tasks.description: Apply comprehensive Tailwind styling, add smooth animations, ensure responsive design works on mobile and desktop. Polish the user experience.

tasks.title: Testing Suite
tasks.description: Write comprehensive unit and integration tests. Test all components, the custom hook, and the complete user workflow. Ensure 80%+ coverage.
